trans-unit.resname: 「無事 入門試験は済ませてきたんだろうなッ！ <select> イエッサー！ いいえ <select_end> <case 1> <break> <case 2> <break> <case_cancel> <break> <case_end>
trans-unit.source: <attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>You've returned! I assume that means you've successfully completed your initiation exam, right?! <select> Yes sir! No, sir. <select_end> <case 1> <break> <case 2> <break> <case_cancel> <break> <case_end>
trans-unit.target: <attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>You've returned! I assume that means you've successfully completed your initiation exam, right?! <select> Yes sir! No, sir. <select_end> <case 1> <break> <case 2> <break> <case_cancel> <break> <case_end>

context-group.context: 「無事 入門試験は済ませてきたんだろうなッ！ <select> イエッサー！ いいえ <select_end> <case 1> <break> <case 2> <break> <case_cancel> <break> <case_end>

trans-unit.resname: 解放の扉に到達した！
trans-unit.source: You've reached the Door of Return!
trans-unit.target: Test test

context-group.context: 解放の扉に到達した！

trans-unit.resname: 階に移動できそうだ。 移動しますか？<yesno><close>
trans-unit.source: You can proceed to the next floor down from here. Go to the next floor?<yesno><close>
trans-unit.target: You can proceed to the next floor down from here. Go to the next floor?<yesno><close>

context-group.context: 階に移動できそうだ。 移動しますか？<yesno><close>

trans-unit.resname: はじめての町に 着きました！ 全滅時の復活場所を 変更しておくと安心です。
trans-unit.source:
This is your first visit to this town! It may be advantageous to change your resurrection spot to here in case your party is defeated.
Change your current resurrection spot to this town?
trans-unit.target:
This is your first visit to this town! It may be advantageous to change your resurrection spot to here in case your party is defeated.
Change your current resurrection spot to this town?

context-group.context: はじめての町に 着きました！ 全滅時の復活場所を 変更しておくと安心です。

trans-unit.resname: すべてのスキルで スキルポイントを ２０Ｐかくとく！ <color_yellow>スキルふりわけ画面で 確認しましょう。 <color_white><me 71><bw_break>
trans-unit.source: Received 20 skill points in all of your skill lines! <color_yellow>Check the "Skill Points" screen.<color_white><me 71><bw_break>
trans-unit.target: Received 20 skill points in all of your skill lines! <color_yellow>Check the "Skill Points" screen.<color_white><me 71><bw_break>

context-group.context: すべてのスキルで スキルポイントを ２０Ｐかくとく！ <color_yellow>スキルふりわけ画面で 確認しましょう。 <color_white><me 71><bw_break>

trans-unit.resname: 冒険者のあなたに 心強い仲間と すぐに 強くなれる帽子を 用意しました。
trans-unit.source:
Welcome to Astoltia!
As an adventurer beginning past Version 1, you'll be given strong allies and a hat that'll help you to get stronger.
trans-unit.target:
Welcome to Astoltia!
As an adventurer beginning past Version 1, you'll be given strong allies and a hat that'll help you to get stronger.

context-group.context: 冒険者のあなたに 心強い仲間と すぐに 強くなれる帽子を 用意しました。

trans-unit.resname:
遠くの場所へ　行きたい場合は　町にある列車や どうぐ欄の中にある　ルーラストーンが あなたの冒険を　助けてくれるでしょう。
冒険で困ったときは　『さくせん』コマンドにある 『遊び方ガイド』の『遊び方のヒント』からでも 冒険に役立つ情報が　確認できます。
ゲームについて　さらに　くわしく知りたい場合は 冒険者の広場にて　ご確認ください。 https://sqex.to/MGUIDE
さあ　旅立ちのときです。 この広い世界の冒険を　楽しんでください。
trans-unit.source:
Many a challenge awaits you in this grand world. Talking to the villagers in this town may provide you with some helpful information.
Quests will be marked with purple icons. If you find yourself lost, opening your map can show you the way.
To travel to faraway places, you can use a train station or a Zoomstone, located under the "Items" command.
You can find useful adventuring information in the "Play Guide" section using the "Misc." command.
Now, it is time to embark on your great journey. Adventure awaits!
trans-unit.target:
Many a challenge awaits you in this grand world. Talking to the villagers in this town may provide you with some helpful information.
Quests will be marked with purple icons. If you find yourself lost, opening your map can show you the way.
To travel to faraway places, you can use a train station or a Zoomstone, located under the "Items" command.
You can find useful adventuring information in the "Play Guide" section using the "Misc." command.
Now, it is time to embark on your great journey. Adventure awaits!

context-group.context:
遠くの場所へ　行きたい場合は　町にある列車や どうぐ欄の中にある　ルーラストーンが あなたの冒険を　助けてくれるでしょう。
冒険で困ったときは　『さくせん』コマンドにある 『遊び方ガイド』の『遊び方のヒント』からでも 冒険に役立つ情報が　確認できます。
ゲームについて　さらに　くわしく知りたい場合は 冒険者の広場にて　ご確認ください。 https://sqex.to/MGUIDE
さあ　旅立ちのときです。 この広い世界の冒険を　楽しんでください。

trans-unit.resname: 体験版では これ以上 お礼は渡せないんだ。 製品版で また その人に話しかけてくれ。
trans-unit.source:
Ohh, thank you! I see you've found one of my chosen residents! Here, this is for you!
...hang on. You're currently playing the trial version, so I can't give you anything else until you upgrade to the full version.
You'll have to speak with them again once you have the full version to get something.
trans-unit.target:
Ohh, thank you! I see you've found one of my chosen residents! Here, this is for you!
...hang on. You're currently playing the trial version, so I can't give you anything else until you upgrade to the full version.
You'll have to speak with them again once you have the full version to get something.

context-group.context: 体験版では これ以上 お礼は渡せないんだ。 製品版で また その人に話しかけてくれ。

trans-unit.resname: 「宝珠を 青い炎に捧げた後も 呪文や特技の表示内容は 一度変更するまで 今の状態が 記憶されているぞ。
trans-unit.source:
Even after offering the jewel to the blue flame, your current skill and spell positions will stay as they are.
I've placed the stone into your bag. Please return here if you need my services again.
trans-unit.target:
Even after offering the jewel to the blue flame, your current skill and spell positions will stay as they are.
I've placed the stone into your bag. Please return here if you need my services again.

context-group.context: 「宝珠を 青い炎に捧げた後も 呪文や特技の表示内容は 一度変更するまで 今の状態が 記憶されているぞ。

trans-unit.resname: ゴールド受け取った。 やりなおしの宝珠を 受け取るがいい。
trans-unit.source: Thank you. Please take this stone.
trans-unit.target: Thank you. Please take this stone.

context-group.context: ゴールド受け取った。 やりなおしの宝珠を 受け取るがいい。

trans-unit.resname: 』に 勝利した！<me 58><auto_bw=10000><close>
trans-unit.source: You emerged victorious!<me 58><auto_bw=10000><close>
trans-unit.target: You emerged victorious!<me 58><auto_bw=10000><close>

context-group.context: 』に 勝利した！<me 58><auto_bw=10000><close>

trans-unit.resname: 私の旅路の すべてを聞きたくない？ 何から 話してあげましょうか？ <select 1> 時獄の迷宮を脱出したあとは？ エテーネ王国では？ 古グランゼドーラ王国では？ 時渡りの呪いについて これからのメレアーデ ネコちゃんについて やめる <select_end> <case 1> <break> <case 2> <break> <case 3> <break> <case 4> <break> <case 5> <break> <case 6> <break> <case 7> <break> <case_cancel> <break> <case_end>
trans-unit.source: By the way, is there something you wanted to ask me about my journey? Where should I begin? <select 1> After escaping the Time Prison? Ethene Kingdom? Old Gran Zedora Kingdom? Ask about the time traveling curse. Future Mereade Ask about the cat. Cancel <select_end> <case 1> <break> <case 2> <break> <case 3> <break> <case 4> <break> <case 5> <break> <case 6> <break> <case 7> <break> <case_cancel> <break> <case_end>

trans-unit.resname:
ぼくの指示が　下手だったみたいだね。 　もう一度　一緒に　がんばってくれる？
「きみの準備が　ととのったら 　聖なる織り機の前に　座ってね。
trans-unit.source:
Agh, I'm sorry, I'm sorry! I should've been better at giving instructions. Do you want to try one more time?
Whenever you're ready, please sit in front of the loom again.
trans-unit.target:
Agh, I'm sorry, I'm sorry! I should've been better at giving instructions. Do you want to try one more time?
Whenever you're ready, please sit in front of the loom again.

context-group.context:
ぼくの指示が　下手だったみたいだね。 　もう一度　一緒に　がんばってくれる？
「きみの準備が　ととのったら 　聖なる織り機の前に　座ってね。

trans-unit.resname: ボタンを 押してみますか？ あと７日で 獲得できるようになります。<yesno><close>
trans-unit.source: You won't receive any Golden Treasure since you've explored already. Press the button anyways? You can explore again in 7 days.<yesno><close>
trans-unit.target: You won't receive any Golden Treasure since you've explored already. Press the button anyways? You can explore again in 7 days.<yesno><close>

trans-unit.resname:
感じるぞ！　キミから　濃厚にただよう 　超一流っぽい匂いを……。
「キミに　戦いを挑もう！ 　ワガハイ考案の　クイズバトルという戦いを。 　この挑戦　受けてくれるね？
trans-unit.source:
I see... I can feel it! I can even smell it on you! The makings of "the best"...
I challenge you to a battle: a quiz of my own design! Do you accept my challenge?
trans-unit.target:
I see... I can feel it! I can even smell it on you! The makings of "the best"...
I challenge you to a battle: a quiz of my own design! Do you accept my challenge?

context-group.context:
感じるぞ！　キミから　濃厚にただよう 　超一流っぽい匂いを……。
「キミに　戦いを挑もう！ 　ワガハイ考案の　クイズバトルという戦いを。 　この挑戦　受けてくれるね？

trans-unit.resname:
でも　ひとつ　忠告です。くれぐれも 　パピルマさんのクチぐせに　影響されないでね。
「わたくしたちは　客商売なのだから 　依頼者と接するときは 　ていねいに　お話しすること。よろしくて？ 了解です！ わっかたでやーんす 気をつけるじゃんよぉ
trans-unit.source:
Hey! But one word of advice. Don't be influenced by Papilma's mouth. We are a customer service firm, so be polite
when dealing with clients. Okay? I understand! I got it. I'll be careful.
trans-unit.target:
Hey! But one word of advice. Don't be influenced by Papilma's mouth. We are a customer service firm, so be polite
when dealing with clients. Okay? I understand! I got it. I'll be careful.

context-group.context:
でも　ひとつ　忠告です。くれぐれも 　パピルマさんのクチぐせに　影響されないでね。
「わたくしたちは　客商売なのだから 　依頼者と接するときは 　ていねいに　お話しすること。よろしくて？ 了解です！ わっかたでやーんす 気をつけるじゃんよぉ

trans-unit.resname:
今　ボクが読んだ辺りを　探して 　写真を　撮ってきてほしいんだ。
「うまく　写真が撮れたら　だいじなものに 　入るはずだから　その状態で 　戻ってきてくれないかな？　よろしく頼むよ。
trans-unit.source:
I'd like you to head over to the area I just read about and take a photograph.
If you manage to take a good enough photo, I'm sure you can find something important. Could you please bring one to me?
trans-unit.target:
I'd like you to head over to the area I just read about and take a photograph.
If you manage to take a good enough photo, I'm sure you can find something important. Could you please bring one to me?

context-group.context:
今　ボクが読んだ辺りを　探して 　写真を　撮ってきてほしいんだ。
「うまく　写真が撮れたら　だいじなものに 　入るはずだから　その状態で 　戻ってきてくれないかな？　よろしく頼むよ。

trans-unit.resname:
神聖秘文の答えが　わかったのかな。 　答えがわかったなら　ボクにも教えてくれない？
「ただし　回答は　ひとつしか受け付けられないし 　一度　回答した後　何分かは　次の神聖秘文に 　挑戦することもできないから　注意して。
「回答をせずに　時間切れになった人がいた場合 　失敗となるから　それも　気をつけてね。 　本当に　神聖秘文を唱えるってことで　いい？
trans-unit.source:
Could it be that you've figured out the answer to the sacred text? If you do, could you please tell me as well?
However, once you tell me, that's it. You only get one answer. After that, you can't attempt solving another sacred text for some time.
Also, if you fail to answer within the time limit, the investigation will be considered failed. Please keep that in mind. Well?
trans-unit.target:
Could it be that you've figured out the answer to the sacred text? If you do, could you please tell me as well?
However, once you tell me, that's it. You only get one answer. After that, you can't attempt solving another sacred text for some time.
Also, if you fail to answer within the time limit, the investigation will be considered failed. Please keep that in mind. Well?

context-group.context:
神聖秘文の答えが　わかったのかな。 　答えがわかったなら　ボクにも教えてくれない？
「ただし　回答は　ひとつしか受け付けられないし 　一度　回答した後　何分かは　次の神聖秘文に 　挑戦することもできないから　注意して。
「回答をせずに　時間切れになった人がいた場合 　失敗となるから　それも　気をつけてね。 　本当に　神聖秘文を唱えるってことで　いい？

trans-unit.resname: すでに 解き明かしています。 リプレイとなりますが ふたたび 挑戦しますか？<yesno><break>
trans-unit.source: You've already solved this sacred text. Are you all right with doing it again?<yesno><break>
trans-unit.target: You've already solved this sacred text. Are you all right with doing it again?<yesno><break>

context-group.context: すでに 解き明かしています。 リプレイとなりますが ふたたび 挑戦しますか？<yesno><break>

trans-unit.resname: 「五・七・五の それぞれの頭の２文字…… 神 春 無為をとって この国は カミハルムイと 呼ばれるようになったのです。
trans-unit.source:
Three words taken from this verseー"divine", "spring", and "idly"ーcan be said "kami", "haru", and "mui". That is how this city came
to be called Kamiharmui.
trans-unit.target:
Three words taken from this verseー"divine", "spring", and "idly"ーcan be said "kami", "haru", and "mui". That is how this city came
to be called Kamiharmui.

context-group.context: 「五・七・五の それぞれの頭の２文字…… 神 春 無為をとって この国は カミハルムイと 呼ばれるようになったのです。

trans-unit.resname: <icon_exc>「なるほど わかりましたぞ！ キヨクサは ギョクサ…… すなわし 王座を示しておるのですな？
trans-unit.source: <icon_exc>I see, I understand now! "Thrown" is "throne"... So it that what it's showing, then?
trans-unit.target: <icon_exc>I see, I understand now! "Thrown" is "throne"... So it that what it's showing, then?

context-group.context: <icon_exc>「なるほど わかりましたぞ！ キヨクサは ギョクサ…… すなわし 王座を示しておるのですな？

trans-unit.resname: 「神代過ぎ～ 春の桜よ 無為に咲く～ 清き風吹き 草木は芽吹く～。
trans-unit.source: "Past ages divine, the spring blossoms bloom, waiting idly by... Pure winds blow and trees grown, budding green as the breeze is thrown."
trans-unit.target: "Past ages divine, the spring blossoms bloom, waiting idly by... Pure winds blow and trees grown, budding green as the breeze is thrown."

context-group.context: 「神代過ぎ～ 春の桜よ 無為に咲く～ 清き風吹き 草木は芽吹く～。

trans-unit.resname: 「さて 上の句の神 春 無為 と同様に 下の句の 上２文字を読むと なんという言葉が 浮かんできますかな。
trans-unit.source: In regards to the second part of the song, the very last word is something you may want to pay attention to...
trans-unit.target: In regards to the second part of the song, the very last word is something you may want to pay attention to...

context-group.context: 「さて 上の句の神 春 無為 と同様に 下の句の 上２文字を読むと なんという言葉が 浮かんできますかな。

trans-unit.resname: 「……ふむ。 清…草…… キヨ クサですな。
trans-unit.source: The word "thrown"... Does it make you think of anything?<yesno><close>
trans-unit.target: The word "thrown"... Does it make you think of anything?<yesno><close>

context-group.context: 「……ふむ。 清…草…… キヨ クサですな。

trans-unit.resname: 「わしは この言葉にこそ 手がかりがあると 思うのですが キヨクサとは何であるか……。 この城の中に あるものでしょうかな？
trans-unit.source: I believe a clue lies within this word "thrown", but what could it mean...? Does it exist in the castle, I wonder?<yesno><close>
trans-unit.target: I believe a clue lies within this word "thrown", but what could it mean...? Does it exist in the castle, I wonder?<yesno><close>

context-group.context: 「わしは この言葉にこそ 手がかりがあると 思うのですが キヨクサとは何であるか……。 この城の中に あるものでしょうかな？

trans-unit.resname: このカミハルムイ城の中に キヨクサが指す 何かがあると……そう おっしゃるのかな？
trans-unit.source: So you're saying...there's something inside this castle that points to the word "thrown"?<yesno><close>
trans-unit.target: So you're saying...there's something inside this castle that points to the word "thrown"?<yesno><close>

context-group.context: このカミハルムイ城の中に キヨクサが指す 何かがあると……そう おっしゃるのかな？

trans-unit.resname: 「ほう! キヨクサの答えが わかったと! では すまぬが キヨクサの指すものを 写真に撮ってきてもらえますかな？
trans-unit.source: Oh, ho! So you've figured it out, have you? Then, if it's not too much trouble, could I bother you to take a photo of it for me?
trans-unit.target: Oh, ho! So you've figured it out, have you? Then, if it's not too much trouble, could I bother you to take a photo of it for me?

context-group.context: 「ほう! キヨクサの答えが わかったと! では すまぬが キヨクサの指すものを 写真に撮ってきてもらえますかな？

trans-unit.resname: 「正しい写真を撮れば だいじなものに入るはず。 それを わしに 見せてくだされ。 ……ホッホッホッ。楽しみですな。
trans-unit.source:
If you manage to take the correct photo, it will be placed in your Key Items. Please show it to me then. Hohoho... I'm looking
forward to it!
trans-unit.target:
If you manage to take the correct photo, it will be placed in your Key Items. Please show it to me then. Hohoho... I'm looking
forward to it!

context-group.context: 「正しい写真を撮れば だいじなものに入るはず。 それを わしに 見せてくだされ。 ……ホッホッホッ。楽しみですな。

trans-unit.resname: 「謎が隠されている 神代の春の歌の下の句は ……清き風吹き 草木は芽吹く。 上2文字を読むと キヨクサとなりますな。
trans-unit.source: A mystery hidden in the Song of Divine Spring's second part... The final word "thrown" seems to be the key. <open_irai>
trans-unit.target: A mystery hidden in the Song of Divine Spring's second part... The final word "thrown" seems to be the key. <open_irai>

context-group.context: 「謎が隠されている 神代の春の歌の下の句は ……清き風吹き 草木は芽吹く。 上2文字を読むと キヨクサとなりますな。

trans-unit.resname: 「もしかすると キヨクサという言葉の 読み方を変えるなど 工夫をすれば 答えが 見えてくるのでしょうか。
trans-unit.source: Perhaps if you can think of another word or phrase that sounds like "thrown", then you can figure it out.
trans-unit.target: Perhaps if you can think of another word or phrase that sounds like "thrown", then you can figure it out.

context-group.context: 「もしかすると キヨクサという言葉の 読み方を変えるなど 工夫をすれば 答えが 見えてくるのでしょうか。

trans-unit.resname: カミハルムイ城内にある キヨクサの指すものを 写真に撮ってきてもらえますかな？
trans-unit.source: If you could, can you take a picture of what you think "thrown" means from inside the castle?
trans-unit.target: If you could, can you take a picture of what you think "thrown" means from inside the castle?

context-group.context: カミハルムイ城内にある キヨクサの指すものを 写真に撮ってきてもらえますかな？

trans-unit.resname: この城の中にあるという キヨクサが指すものを 写真に 収められましたのでしょうかな？
trans-unit.source: Oh? Were you able to take a photo of the "thrown" inside the castle?
trans-unit.target: Oh? Were you able to take a photo of the "thrown" inside the castle?

context-group.context: この城の中にあるという キヨクサが指すものを 写真に 収められましたのでしょうかな？

trans-unit.resname: 「おや この写真に写っとるのは ニコロイ王 ？
trans-unit.source: Ah, this is a photo of King Nikoroi, isn't it? So this is what you believe the word "thrown" is referring to?<yesno><close>
trans-unit.target: Ah, this is a photo of King Nikoroi, isn't it? So this is what you believe the word "thrown" is referring to?<yesno><close>

context-group.context: 「おや この写真に写っとるのは ニコロイ王 ？

trans-unit.resname: わしには ニコロイ王と キヨクサの関係が わかりかねますぞ。
trans-unit.source: What? I'm not sure I'm seeing the connection between King Nikoroi and "thrown" here...
trans-unit.target: What? I'm not sure I'm seeing the connection between King Nikoroi and "thrown" here...

context-group.context: わしには ニコロイ王と キヨクサの関係が わかりかねますぞ。

trans-unit.resname: 「写真は これで正しいような気もしますが……。 キヨクサが 本当に ニコロイ王を指すのか もう一度 よくお考えいただけますかな？
trans-unit.source: This photo does seem correct, but... Can you reconsider if there really is a connection between King Nikoroi and "thrown"?
trans-unit.target: This photo does seem correct, but... Can you reconsider if there really is a connection between King Nikoroi and "thrown"?

context-group.context: 「写真は これで正しいような気もしますが……。 キヨクサが 本当に ニコロイ王を指すのか もう一度 よくお考えいただけますかな？

trans-unit.resname: 「なんと! ニコロイ王が キヨクサではないと。 では ニコロイ王のほかに 写っているのは……
trans-unit.source: What?! King Nikoroi isn't related to "thrown"? Then, what is...?
trans-unit.target: What?! King Nikoroi isn't related to "thrown"? Then, what is...?

context-group.context: 「なんと! ニコロイ王が キヨクサではないと。 では ニコロイ王のほかに 写っているのは……

trans-unit.resname:
は　なぞの小箱を じっくり　ながめてみた。
は　小箱の裏に 文字が刻まれているのを　見つけた！
うるわしき　女王の統べる　白亜の城の南 朽ちたる柵を越えゆけば　水晶のごとく 麗しき　蒼い肌の魔女が　手招きす。
我を開きたくば　魔女に勝利せよ。
trans-unit.source:
carefully examines the Mystery Box.
finds letters engraved on the back side of the box!
"To the south of the chalky castle where the beautiful queen sings and beyond the decayed fence, beckons the witch
with the blue, crystalline-skin."
trans-unit.target:
carefully examines the Mystery Box.
finds letters engraved on the back side of the box!
"To the south of the chalky castle where the beautiful queen sings and beyond the decayed fence, beckons the witch
with the blue, crystalline-skin."

我を開きたくば　魔女に勝利せよ。

trans-unit.resname:
は　なぞの小箱を じっくり　ながめてみた。
どうやら　かかっていた術が　解けているようだ！

carefully examines the Mystery Box.
It seems the spell has been broken!
trans-unit.target:
carefully examines the Mystery Box.
It seems the spell has been broken!

context-group.context:

trans-unit.resname: 「<pc> こんにちはクポ！ モグのあげたコインは お役に立ったクポ？<bw_break>
trans-unit.source: <pc>! Hello, kupo! Was the coin that I gave you useful? <bw_break>
trans-unit.target: <pc>! Hello, kupo! Was the coin that I gave you useful? <bw_break>

context-group.context: 「<pc> こんにちはクポ！ モグのあげたコインは お役に立ったクポ？<bw_break>

trans-unit.resname: <pc>たちが 扉を開けると なんと チュピちゃんが 飛んできて 部屋の中へ すべりこんだ！
trans-unit.source: When <pc> opens the door, Chupie came flying past and slipped through the door!
trans-unit.target: When <pc> opens the door, Chupie came flying past and slipped through the door!

context-group.context: <pc>たちが 扉を開けると なんと チュピちゃんが 飛んできて 部屋の中へ すべりこんだ！

trans-unit.resname: 「おかえりなさい！ <pc>様！ お部屋の準備も すっかり整っておりますよ。 もう お休みになりますか？<yesno><break>
trans-unit.source: Welcome back! Your room is ready. Would you like to rest now?<yesno><break>
trans-unit.target: Welcome back! Your room is ready. Would you like to rest now?<yesno><break>

context-group.context: 「おかえりなさい！ <pc>様！ お部屋の準備も すっかり整っておりますよ。 もう お休みになりますか？<yesno><break>

trans-unit.resname: 断罪の剣の内なる世界が これまで以上に 大きな干渉を受けているようだ。
trans-unit.source: The path forward is blocked by an obtrusion even larger than before.
trans-unit.target: The path forward is blocked by an obtrusion even larger than before.

context-group.context: 断罪の剣の内なる世界が これまで以上に 大きな干渉を受けているようだ。

trans-unit.resname:
「そっから　『キャラの場所』ってのを選べば 　誰が　どこさいるか　わかるはずだっぺ。 　他の機能も　便利だから　試してみてくんろ。
「孫のシンイさまは　あんなに　優しくて 　ステキな人だのになぁ。 　アバさまは　本当に　怖いっぺ。
trans-unit.source:
Huh? Are ya goin' to Abba's to apologize for Shinonome's mistake?!
Abba gets super scary when she's steamed. Hope she doesn't scold ya too much!
If ya need to find her house, open the map and look for her house with the shiny star mark.
You see "Menu Display" at the bottom of the map there? Open that up and select "NPC Location", and you can see who's where.
The other functions're useful too, so be sure to check 'em out.
Abba's grandson, Shini...he's so nice. But man, is she scary...
trans-unit.target:
Huh? Are ya goin' to Abba's to apologize for Shinonome's mistake?!
Abba gets super scary when she's steamed. Hope she doesn't scold ya too much!
If ya need to find her house, open the map and look for her house with the shiny star mark.
You see "Menu Display" at the bottom of the map there? Open that up and select "NPC Location", and you can see who's where.
The other functions're useful too, so be sure to check 'em out.
Abba's grandson, Shini...he's so nice. But man, is she scary...

context-group.context:
「そっから　『キャラの場所』ってのを選べば 　誰が　どこさいるか　わかるはずだっぺ。 　他の機能も　便利だから　試してみてくんろ。
「孫のシンイさまは　あんなに　優しくて 　ステキな人だのになぁ。 　アバさまは　本当に　怖いっぺ。

trans-unit.resname: <attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「アバさまに しかられずに済んだだか？ シンイさまの お使いで済むんなら やすいもんだべ。
trans-unit.source:
So, didja manage to avoid gettin' scolded by Abba? You got off easy if it's just an errand ya need to run for Shini!
Fluffy Rice Husks can be found in the Water Cabin, and old man Kudai often uses Dried Antidotal Herbs to make tea.
If ya get lost, go ahead and open the map and look for the shiny star mark, 'kay?
You see "Menu Display" at the bottom of the map there? Open that up and select "NPC Location", and you can see who's where.
The other functions're useful too, so be sure to check 'em out.
trans-unit.target:
So, didja manage to avoid gettin' scolded by Abba? You got off easy if it's just an errand ya need to run for Shini!
Fluffy Rice Husks can be found in the Water Cabin, and old man Kudai often uses Dried Antidotal Herbs to make tea.
If ya get lost, go ahead and open the map and look for the shiny star mark, 'kay?
You see "Menu Display" at the bottom of the map there? Open that up and select "NPC Location", and you can see who's where.
The other functions're useful too, so be sure to check 'em out.

context-group.context: <attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「アバさまに しかられずに済んだだか？ シンイさまの お使いで済むんなら やすいもんだべ。

trans-unit.resname:
「やっと　新たな主神を見つけたのに 　自分のやりたいことを　優先するなんて 　どうして……。
「追いかけようと　思ったけど 　ラキでも　ニオイをたどれなかった。
trans-unit.source:
Finally, after we found the new Almighty... He goes off and does what he wants. Why...?
Lycae thought about chasing after him, but even he couldn't track his scent.
trans-unit.target:
Finally, after we found the new Almighty... He goes off and does what he wants. Why...?
Lycae thought about chasing after him, but even he couldn't track his scent.

context-group.context:
「やっと　新たな主神を見つけたのに 　自分のやりたいことを　優先するなんて 　どうして……。
「追いかけようと　思ったけど 　ラキでも　ニオイをたどれなかった。
